US bank holiday: November 11, 2024 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments will be paused on Monday, November 11, 2024, due to a US public holiday.

Due to an upcoming public holiday on Monday, November 11, 2024, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.

USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day.

EUR SEPA transfers and GBP FPS transfers, as well as credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers, will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any assistance, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish all our US customers a pleasant Veterans Day.
Bank holidays notice: November 11, 2024, USD payments paused
